content.text:
This is a Demo of the Genba application of SenseMaker, this is designed to used on the SenseMaker APP for the full experience (i.e the ability to see and explore responses, and to receive notifications and pulses). This shows a selection of different response paths, these can be customised and added to, as well as the ability to issue pulses and notifications when you need to.

 

Privacy settings can be customised so that there are different levels of access and sharing.
